title: Average ticket price of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is gradually decreasing from 2008 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 90.13 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 63.59 was reported at Year 2013,  2014, and 2015
